Class: GameCore

GameCore

new GameCore(game_instance)

Now the main game class. This gets created on both server and client. Server creates one for each game that is hosted, and client creates one for itself to play the game.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
game_instance Game Optional parameter. Client player uses it.
